name: formiga
description: A Form validator for React, using and customizing HTML5 Constraint Validation API
author: Donato Lorenzo <donato@afialapis.com>

scripts.xx_test: npm run clean-test && rollup -c rollup.test.js && karma start --singleRun
scripts.xx_lib: npm run clean-lib && babel src -d lib
scripts.xx_prepare: npm run clean-demo && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean-test && npm run lib && npm run dist
scripts.xx_demo: npm run clean-demo && mkdir demo/dist && rollup -c rollup.demo.js -w
scripts.xx_reset: npm run clean-demo && npm run clean-test && npm run clean-lib && npm run clean-dist && rm -fr node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
